article.content:
Help get the word out about the joint GCC2018 & BOSC 2018 conference. [
![Help get the word out!](./gccbosc2018-flyer-thumb.png)
](https://depot.galaxyproject.org/hub/attachments/events/gccbosc2018/gccbosc2018-flyer.pdf) Flyer ===== * Help get the word out by distributing / posting the conference [flyer](https://depot.galaxyproject.org/hub/attachments/events/gccbosc2018/gccbosc2018-flyer.pdf) Conference Graphics =================== Logo ---- In [Big (6360 x 6360)](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-big.png), [Medium (800 x 800)](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-800.png), and [Small (300 x 300)](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-300.png) sizes: [
![GCC2018 + BOSC 2018 Conference Logo, big](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-big.png)
](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-big.png) [
![GCC2018 + BOSC 2018 Conference Logo, medium](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-800.png)
](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-800.png) [
![GCC2018 + BOSC 2018 Conference Logo, small](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-300.png)
](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-300.png) Banner ------ In one size fits all size: [
![GCC2018 + BOSC 2018 Conference Banner](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-banner.png)
](/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-banner.png) Project Logos ------------- * BOSC: [Github](https://github.com/OBF/bosc_materials/tree/master/logos), [Wiki](https://www.open-bio.org/wiki/Category:OBF_Logos) * [Galaxy](/images/galaxy-logos/) Slides ====== Giving a presentation? Include a slide or two about the conference. * [PowerPoint](https://depot.galaxyproject.org/hub/attachments/documents/presentations/gccbosc2018-slides.pptx) * [PDF](https://depot.galaxyproject.org/hub/attachments/documents/presentations/gccbosc2018-slides.pdf)
